page.title: 08FARMING IN HARPUR HILL
page.content: { From the map we found the names of {7 farms:-{Temple, Burlow, Manor, Foxlow, {Hillhead, Heathfield Nook and Staden {Grange.} We found the remains of {Temple Farm} on our field trip. From the walls we could see its size and shape. Probably no-one has lived there for 50 years. {Burlow Farm} was demolished to make way for houses and {Burlow Garage}is all that remains to remind us of it. {Manor Farm}is a small holding now with turkeys. None of these 3 places are marked on the latest maps.{ {Hillhead Farm }is remote but has both sheep & cattle. Mr Slack owns it. Heathfield Nook is a dairy farm but much of the Bennett's land is outside our area. The land of{Staden Grange}is now part of{Foxlow Farm.
